CustomField.description: The field on the source object that looks up to the target object (i.e., the parent object). For instance, if a field on Opportunity is being rolled up to a field on an Account, the merge field would be 'AccountId.'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The field on the source object that looks up to the target object (i.e., the parent object). For instance, if a field on Opportunity is being rolled up to a field on an Account, the merge field would be 'AccountId.'
CustomField.label: Merge Field
